user_query: I'm planning a family vacation and I need some help. Can you fetch the weather forecast for the next 5 days in Miami? Also, find me the best hotels in the area and provide details about the nearby administrative divisions and countries. Thank you!

TaskList.description: Fetch the weather forecast for the next 5 days in Miami.
Find the best hotels in Miami.
Provide details about the nearby administrative divisions and countries related to Miami.
